sources.title: Harlem Rides the Range
sources.description: Taken from IMDB : Bradley is after Dennison's radium mine and it appears that his henchman Conners has killed him. When Blake arrives at Dennison's, Bradley and Conners arrive at the same time. When Blake leaves he drops a glove. Bradley kills Conners and uses the glove to frame Blake. Learning of Bradley's plan to kill Dennison's daughter, Blake escapes jail and sets out to reach her,

sources.title: Harlem Rides the Range (1939) WESTERN
sources.description:
BLACK HISTORY MONTH
Stars: Herb Jeffries, Lucius Brooks, F.E. Miller
 Director: Richard C. Kahn
 Writers: Spencer Williams (story)

 A cowboy and his sidekick try to help a homesteader from being cheated out of his property.

metadata.Plot: Bradley is after Dennison's radium mine and it appears that his henchman Conners has killed him. When Blake arrives at Dennison's, Bradley and Conners arrive at the same time. When Blake leaves he drops a glove. Bradley kills Conners and uses the glove to frame Blake. Learning of Bradley's plan to kill Dennison's daughter, Blake escapes jail and sets out to reach her first.
metadata.Actors: Herb Jeffries, Lucius Brooks, F.E. Miller
